parameters.jsCode:
const body = $input.first().json.body || $input.first().json || {};
return [{ json: { content_id: body.content_id, script: body.script, diagrams: body.diagrams || [], channel_id: body.channel_id, timestamp: new Date().toISOString() } }];

parameters.query: INSERT INTO visual_annotations (content_id, annotations, diagrams, ai_annotation_model, annotation_count, confidence_score) VALUES ($1, $2::jsonb, $3::jsonb, 'gemini-1.5-pro', $4, 0.85) ON CONFLICT (content_id) DO UPDATE SET annotations = $2::jsonb, diagrams = $3::jsonb, annotation_count = $4, updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id
